title: Out of bounds: Teenage sexual harassment
creator_credit: Coronet, Donald R. Ham and Yvonne Harper
brief_description: Aimed at teenagers this documentary explores what constitutes sexual harassment and what can be done to combat it. Sexual harassment is defined as unwanted tension of a sexual nature-attitude is portrayed as the biggest contributor. Issues such as what is defined as bad habits, whistling and joking etc and what to do if your the victim of sexual harassment are explored. The video also offers a solution to the problem- recognising that harassment has taken place and communication to recognise the boundaries of a relationship. The material is presented through a fictional case study which is narrated and commented on.
